headerDisplay: BlueAir Devices are exposed following login to the BlueAir API. All devices on the account should be listed in the Home app following successful login.

enableAWS.title: Enable AWS API connection
enableAWS.description: This is required for devices like DustMagnet, HealthProtect, and Blue Pure.

hideLED.title: Hide LED
hideLED.description: When enabled, this will hide any LED sensor and prevent it from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app as a light bulb.

hideAirQualitySensor.title: Hide Air Quality Sensor
hideAirQualitySensor.description: When enabled, this will hide any Air Quality sensor and prevent it from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app.

hideCO2Sensor.title: Hide CO2 Sensor
hideCO2Sensor.description: When enabled, this will hide any CO2 sensor and prevent it from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app.

hideTemperatureSensor.title: Hide Temperature Sensor
hideTemperatureSensor.description: When enabled, this will hide any Temperature sensor and prevent it from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app.

hideHumiditySensor.title: Hide Humidity Sensor
hideHumiditySensor.description: When enabled, this will hide any Humidity sensor and prevent it from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app.

hideGermShield.title: Hide Germ Shield
hideGermShield.description: When enabled, this will hide all GermShield controls and prevent them from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app as a switch.

hideNightMode.title: Hide Night Mode
hideNightMode.description: When enabled, this will hide all Night Mode controls and prevent them from appearing in Homebridge or in the Home.app as a switch.

items.title: Feature Option
items.description: Enter only one option per entry. See project page for the complete list of available options.
